mapper.insert:
call seq_no()
INSERT INTO tb_product (pro_id,pro_name, pro_real_price, pro_now_price, is_stock, pro_desc, pro_size, pro_color, pro_score, pro_type_id, pro_pic_id, pro_pic_uri, state, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date) VALUES(#{id},#{proName},#{proRealPrice},#{proNowPrice},#{isStock},#{proDesc},#{proSize},#{proColor},#{proScore},#{proTypeId},#{proPicId},#{proPicUri},'1','admin',now(),'admin',now())
mapper.select: SELECT pro_id id, pro_name proName,pro_real_price proRealPrice,pro_now_price proNowPrice,is_stock isStock FROM tb_product t

select P.PRO_ID id, P.PRO_NAME proName, P.PRO_REAL_PRICE proRealPrice, P.PRO_NOW_PRICE proNowPrice, P.IS_STOCK isStock, P.PRO_DESC proDesc, P.PRO_SIZE proSize, P.PRO_COLOR proColor, P.PRO_SCORE proScore, P.PRO_TYPE_ID proTypeId, P.PRO_PIC_ID proPicId, P.PRO_PIC_URI proPicUri, P.STATE state, P.CREATE_BY createBy, P.CREATE_DATE createDate, P.UPDATE_BY updateBy, P.UPDATE_DATE updateDate from tb_product p WHERE p.pro_id=#{id}

SELECT P.PRO_ID id, P.PRO_NAME proName, P.PRO_REAL_PRICE proRealPrice, P.PRO_NOW_PRICE proNowPrice, P.IS_STOCK isStock, P.PRO_DESC proDesc, P.PRO_SIZE proSize, P.PRO_COLOR proColor, P.PRO_SCORE proScore, P.PRO_TYPE_ID proTypeId, P.PRO_PIC_ID proPicId, P.PRO_PIC_URI proPicUri, P.STATE state, P.CREATE_BY createBy, P.CREATE_DATE createDate, P.UPDATE_BY updateBy, P.UPDATE_DATE updateDate, D.DET_ID detId, D.DET_LENGTH detLength, D.DET_WIDTH detWidth, D.DET_HEIGHT detHeight, D.DET_MATE detMate, D.DET_ADDR detAddr, D.DET_DATE detDate, D.DET_DESC detDesc FROM TB_PRODUCT P, TB_PROD_DETAIL D WHERE P.PRO_ID = D.PRO_ID AND P.STATE = '1' AND D.STATE = '1'

SELECT P.*, D.DET_ID , D.DET_LENGTH , D.DET_WIDTH , D.DET_HEIGHT , D.DET_MATE , D.DET_ADDR , D.DET_DATE , D.DET_DESC FROM TB_PRODUCT P, TB_PROD_DETAIL D WHERE P.PRO_ID = D.PRO_ID AND P.STATE = '1' AND D.STATE = '1'

SELECT P.*, D.DET_ID , D.DET_LENGTH , D.DET_WIDTH , D.DET_HEIGHT , D.DET_MATE , D.DET_ADDR , D.DET_DATE , D.DET_DESC FROM TB_PRODUCT P, TB_PROD_DETAIL D WHERE P.PRO_ID = D.PRO_ID AND P.STATE = '1' AND D.STATE = '1'
